Google AdWords 
Opportunity Report

LivePerson data, in conjunction with third-party indicates the impact of setting up Google AdWords click-to-message routed into Liveengage. Use the calculator below to get an estimation of the increase in mobile conversions for your business as well as the value of these mobile conversions The variable factors in LivePerson’s model can be changed using the fields below, so feel free to enter your organization’s information.

Core Assumptions

Enter the current number of agents employed across your brand’s contact centers

Enter the number(%) of paid search to your total mobile traffic

The average number of interactions with customer service by each customer annually

None of the information entered on this page is collected in any way. It is used solely for the purpose of the calculations herein, and is not stored by any party.

  • Potential Volume $ Growth

*The variance in conservative, likely, and conservative projections is based on the prominence at which your company makes messaging available on its various customer touchpoints, as well as the completeness of processes — such as dispute resolution and change of address — it handles over messaging.

Based on industry benchmarks, LivePerson estimates CustomInk is converting 85,352 of these visits and spending $6,435,537 to drive these conversions. The analysis above has uncovered a substantial opportunity for you to boost mobile conversions by 4,268 – 12,803 units annually, without increasing its advertising budget. These additional conversions would typically cost you an extra $321,777 – $965,330 in advertising dollars. The benefits described above can potentially be captured through the implementation of Google’s new click-to-message AdWords extension. This extension lets consumers SMS with your brand directly from mobile ads in a single click, immediately connecting you to the consumer on their mobile device. LiveEngage ensures these interactions are routed to the right people at the right time across geographies, integrating them into broader marketing programs and operations. To complement this experience and capture a larger share of potential benefits, you can bring the same ease of access to advertising campaign landing pages by adding SMS via LiveEngage. The combination of SMS and the click-to-message extension enables you to construct ads with a value proposition that builds on the SMS capability (e.g., “Text with an expert now”).
